Manx: Er hoh dhyt ny cooinaghtyn ayms jeh Caesar Cashin, S'feer eh dy jarroo dy row Gaelg ry- ynsaghey ayns ny brastyllyn va goll er cummal tra va mee aeg ayns Purt ny Hinshey. By chliaghtey ain son y chooid smoo lhaih ass y Lioar Chasherick agh va caa ain dy chlashtyn rish blass Caesar hene. 'Sy vlein 1932 hie yn "Kione Doo" (my vraar Walter) as mee hene as Noreen (my huyr) gys y vrastyl va goll er cummal ec y traa shen ayns Offish Vainshtyr ny Purt ayns Purt ny Hinshey ayns Straid yn Attey. Hie shin stiagh as hoie shin sheese as yeeagh mee er dagh oltey y vrastyl as va enney mie ayms er y chooid smoo j'eu. Ny vud oc va shenn dooinney ennagh as faasaag liauyr lheeah echey as smooinee mee rhym pene, "Cre'n fa ta'n shenn dooinney shen shirrey Gaelg y ynsaghey as lhied yn eash ersyn?" Cha dooar mee freggyrt da m'eysht yn oie shen agh hooar mee eh tammylt beg ny lurg. Quoi v'ayn agh Philly Quayle, yn dooinney ooasle hene, as eshyn lum-lane dy Gaelg feer vie, agh ghow eh yindys ersyn hene doaltattym nagh dod eh ee y lhaih er chor erbee! Shoh dooyrt eh rhym pene un oie, "Va mee ronsaghey ayns kishtey ennagh as hooar mee Bible Ghaelgagh, doshil mee ee as haink fys hym nagh dod mee ee y lhaih er chor erbee as ta shen y oyr dy daink mee da'n vrastyl." Son shickyrys cha row eh feer foddey derrey va'n dooinney ooasle lhaih y Ghaelg dy flaaoil! Hie kuse j'in oie elley dys brastyl ayns thie ennagh elley fo currym Philly as va ymmodee skeealyn mie ry-chlashtyn ayns shen! Oddagh lioar ve er ny screeu mychione skeealyn Philly. Va shoh yn ennym hug eh orrinyn dy chur er, as myr shen, bee fys euish dy row anmys mooar ain ersyn:

Keayrt dy row vrie shin jeh myr shoh, "Kanys t'ou gra 'Go to the Devil' ayns Gaelg. Dreggyr eh, "If you weren't a gentleman you would say 'Immee gys yn Jouyl'." -- she shoh yn sorch dy ghooinney v'ayn.

Va Caesar Cashin gyn ourys "Ayr ny Gaelgey" ayns Purt ny Hinshey ayns ny laghyn shen. Va Gaelg feer vie echey as Gaelg yindyssagh ry-chlashtyn ec y vrastyl echey. Shegin dou gra, ny yei, dy row Gaelg foddey ny share ry-chlashtyn voish yn moghey 'sy voghrey taaley ass e veeal, tra v'eh skeeabey magh e happ as "Yn Kione Doo" as mee hene cur y bainney stiagh dasyn.

Va ram shenn raaghyn er ny screeu sheese echeysyn as ymmodee j'eu er nyn screeu sheese aym pene. Va ram j'eu cooinit echey voish laghyn e aegid. Ta seaghyn mooar orrym nagh row greie-recortys ayn ayns ny laghyn shid hug Caesar orryms as er my vraar "Kione Doo" dy screeu sheese yn sheean hene jeh'n Ghaelg echey as cha nee yn aght screeuee ta ry-geddyn ayns Gaelg screeuit. Er hoh diu sampleyr jeh: "Niarbyl"--"Ni-err-abul"; "Eairk" (a horn) - "Err-uk", yiarragh eh "Two 'r's will do for English, but you need three in Manx." Rish ymmodee bleeantyn hie 'Kione Doo' as mish, as Caesar hene, gagh Jeheiney Chaisht, dys Eairy Cuishlin, ayns shenn "van". She "Ford" v'ayn. Un cheayrt, tra rosh shin thie Eairy Cuishlin, ren shin shooyl roin er y clyst. Dooyrt Caesar, "Ta shen 'Dalioora', she magher beg 'Dalioora' as magher 'Dalioora' liauyr, as ta skeeal ayn mychione ny magheryn shen."

"Cre ta shen," vrie shin jeh. "Tammylt er dy henney va oarn cuirrit ayns ny magheryn shen as va baar feer vie ayn. V'eh currit ayns sthookyn dy sauchey agh un oie haink sterrym agglagh as va geay-chassee ayn as hie ny deiney sheese dys y vagher jerkal rish folmid y 'akin agh va lane-vaar ny lhie er y thalloo ta shin nyn hassoo er nish."

Tra va shin shooyl er ash thie va "Kione Doo" shirrey "heise" (a lift) y chur da Caesar tra v'eh drappal harrish cleigh ennagh, agh haink sheeb ass Caesar "Faag mee feagh -- ny jean bac orrym." S'feer eh dy row yn aigney echey e aigney hene!

Er hoh yn skeeal s'jerree: Va Thie Lhionney ec Yn Arbyl (The Niarbyl) agh she daa hie v'ayn as daa ven freayll ad. Va daa ayrn fo un chleah as dorrys ec y chione twoaie as dorrys elley ec y chione jiass. Ymmodee keayrtyn va ben ennagh gyllagh. "Trooid raad shoh Whoy -- Jough vie ayns shoh," as harragh coraa elley, foast er ard, voish cheu elley y thie, "Trooid raad 'shoh Whoy, jough ny share ayns shoh!"
